ingredients: 5 cups coarsely chopped mixed fruit (apples, plums, and pears), 1 cup water,   +   3/4 cup apple juice, 1 teaspoon soy sauce, 1 tablespoon apricot preserves,   +   1/2 cup packed light brown sugar,   +   1/2 teaspoon garlic powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon dry mustard
nutrition: Total Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 48mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 56g 20%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 17g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 118mg 589%, Calcium 25mg 2%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 256mg 5%
